p: The collection analyzed in this study included 38 almond genotypes cultivated in Sardinia and seven reference cultivars ( Table 1), representing several almond cultivation regions. Non Pareil and Ne Plus Ultra are two reference cultivars mainly cultivated in California [ 21]. Tuono and Genco are among the most widespread cultivars in Italy [ 22]. Troito A and Troito B are Tuono-related cultivars which are cultivated in Greece [ 23]. Finally, Picantili is a reference cultivar that originated in Russia [ 24].
